00096         protected function __construct(&$db, &$config, $column, $value, $profile = array(), $new = false) {
00097                 // Check the parmeters.
00098                 if(!is_string($column) ||
00099                    !is_string($value) ||
00100                    !$db instanceof DB_Database ||
00101                    !config instanceof MAIN_Config) {
00102                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::WARNING, get_class($this) .
00103                                '::__construct', 'Parameter is not the correct data type.', $this->log);
00104                 }
00105 
00106                 // Store local table, log, and options.
00107                 $this->db            =& $db;
00108                 $this->log           =& $db->getLog();
00109                 $this->config        =& $config;
00110                 $this->table         =& $this->getTable();
00111                 $this->protect       =  self::$enableprotect;
00112                 $this->clienthashing =  $config->getOption('clienthashing');
00113 
00114                 // Initiate the object.
00115                 if(!$new) {
00116                         // Object is old, get info from database.
00117                         $this->updateFromDatabase($column, $value);
00118                 } else {
00119                         // Object is new; put together info array and push to database.
00120                         $this->info = array();
00121                         $info[$column] = $value;
00122                         $info = array_merge($info, $profile);
00123                         if($this->clienthashing) {
00124                                 $info['hash'  ] = self::hashPassword($info['password'], 1000);
00125                                 $info['hasnum'] = 1000;
00126                         } $this->updateToDatabase();
00127                 } $this->log->log(MAIN_Logger::NOTICE, get_class() . '::__construct',
00128                                   "Creating new object with info: " . strtr(var_export($info, true), "\n", ''));
00129         }

00218         public function addChild($child) {
00219                 if(!$this->parent || get_parent_class($child) != 'DB_Object') {
00220                         return false;
00221                 }

00227                 } else {
00228                         $this->profile[$classname] = array(array('id'      => $child->getId(),
00229                                                                  'name'    => $child->getName(),
00230                                                                  'profile' => $child->getProfile(),
00231                                                                  'object'  => &$child));

00257         public function getPassKey() {

00259                         return 1;

00273         public function checkPassword($new, $original = false) {
00274                 if(!$this->protect || !self::$enableprotect) {
00275                         return true;
00276                 }
00277 
00278                 if($original || !$this->clienthashing) {
00279                         // Compare the password to the original hash
00280                         // check if: h(original) == h(given)
00281                         return $this->info['password'] == self::hashPassword($new, $salt);
00282                 } else {
00283                         // Compare the password to the a hash chain
00284                         // check if: h^n(original) == h(h^(n-1)given) where n is the hash chain iteration
00285                         if(self::comparePasswords($this->info['passhash'][1], $new)) {
00286                                 $this->changePasshash($new);
00287                                 return true;
00288                         } else {
00289                                 return false;
00290                         }
00291                 }
00292         }

00304         public function changePassword($new) {
00305                 if(!$this->protect || !self::$enableprotect) {
00306                         return true;
00307                 }
00308 
00309                 $password = self::hashPassword($new);
00310                 $hash     = self::hashPassword($new, 1000);
00311                 $row      = array( 'password' => $password,
00312                                    'hash'     => $hash,
00313                                    'hashnum'  => 1000 );
00314                 $where    = array( 'name'     => $this->info['name'] );
00315 
00316                 $this->info['password'] = $password;
00317                 $this->info['passhash'] = array(1000, $hash);
00318                 return $this->updateToDatabase();
00319         }

00329         protected function changePasshash($new) {
00330                 if(!$this->protect || !self::$enableprotect || !$this->clienthashing) {
00331                         return true;
00332                 }
00333 
00334                 $newnum = $this->info['passhash'][0] - 1;
00335                 $this->info['passhash'] = array($curnum, $new);
00336                 return $this->table->update(array('hash'    => $new,
00337                                                   'hashnum' => $curnum),
00338                                             array('name'    => $info['name']));

00359         public function isAllowed($classname, $action, $property) {
00360                 if(empty($this->auth)) {
00361                         $autharray = $this->config->getOption('auth');
00362                         $groups = explode(',', $this->info['auth']);
00363                         $permissions = array();
00364                         foreach($groups as $group) {
00365                                 if(array_key_exists($group, $autharray)) {
00366                                         $permissions = array_merge($permissions, $autharray[$group]);
00367                                 }
00368                         } $this->auth = $permissions;
00369                 }
00370 
00371                 $x111 = "$classname-$action-$property";
00372                 $x011 = "*-$action-$property";
00373                 $x101 = "$classname-*-$property";
00374                 $x110 = "$classname-$action-*";
00375                 $x001 = "*-*-$property";
00376                 $x010 = "*-$action-*";
00377                 $x100 = "$classname-*-*";
00378                 $x000 = "*-*-*";
00379 
00380                 return in_array($x111, $this->auth) ||
00381                        in_array($x011, $this->auth) ||
00382                        in_array($x101, $this->auth) ||
00383                        in_array($x110, $this->auth) ||
00384                        in_array($x001, $this->auth) ||
00385                        in_array($x010, $this->auth) ||
00386                        in_array($x100, $this->auth) ||
00387                        in_array($x000, $this->auth);
00388         }

00396         public function updateFromDatabase($column, $value) {
00397                 if(!$this->db instanceof DB_Database) {
00398                         return false;
00399                 }
00400 
00401                 $table = $this->getTable();
00402                 $res   = $table->select('*', array($column => $value));
00403                 $this->info = $table->result($res);
00404         }

00411         public function updateToDatabase() {
00412                 if(!$this->db instanceof DB_Database) {
00413                         return false;

00415

00431         protected function getTable() {
00432                 if(!$this->db     instanceof DB_Database ||
00433                    !$this->config instanceof MAIN_Config   ) {
00434                         return false;
00435                 } $table = false;
00436 
00437                 // First check if the table exists.
00438                 $table = $this->db->getTable(strtolower(get_class()));
00439                 if($table !== false) {
00440                         return $table;
00441                 }
00442 
00443                 // Table is not set up, prepare to make new table.
00444                 $models = $this->config->getOption('models');
00445                 $columns = array_pop($models[get_class()]);
00446                 $tablename = strtolower(get_class());
00447                 $sql = "CREATE TABLE $tablename (\n";
00448                 foreach($columns as &$column) {
00449                         $column = explode(',', $column);
00450                         $name = array_pop($column);
00451                         $type = array_pop($column);
00452 
00453                         $sql .= $name . ' ' . $type;
00454                         foreach($column as &$option) {
00455                                 $option = strtolower($option);
00456                                 if($option == 'null') {
00457                                         $sql .= 'NULL ';
00458                                         continue;
00459                                 } else {
00460                                         $sql .= 'NOT NULL ';
00461                                 }
00462 
00463                                 if($option == 'auto_increment') {
00464                                         $sql .= 'AUTO_INCREMENT ';
00465                                         continue;
00466                                 } $option = explode('=', $option);
00467 
00468                                 if($option[0] == 'default') {
00469                                         $sql .= "DEFAULT '" . $option[1] . "' ";
00470                                 } elseif($option[0] == 'comment') {
00471                                         $sql .= "COMMENT '" . $option[1] . "' ";
00472                                 } elseif($option[0] == 'key') {
00473                                         $sql .= strtoupper($option[1]) . ' KEY';
00474                                 }
00475                         } $sql .= ",\n";
00476                 } $sql .= ');';
00477 
00478                 if($this->db->query($sql) && $this->db->connect() &&
00479                    $table = $this->db->getTable(strtolower(get_class()))) {
00480                         return $table;
00481                 } else {
00482                         return new MAIN_Error(MAIN_Error::ERROR, get_class . '::getTable',
00483                                               'Error setting up tabel in database.');
00484                 }
00485         }

00495         public static function hashPassword($password, $iterations = 1) {
00496                 for($i = 0; $i < $iterations; $i++) {
00497                         $hash = hash('sha512', $password);
00498                 } return $hash;
00499         }
